name: All Barcelona Highlights Tour
description:
Enjoy Barcelona in total comfort!

The ideal tour to cover the very best of Barcelona in a day, covering the distances and avoiding queues. Visit all the best sites in Barcelona: Gaudí’s famous buildings – Sagrada Família, Casa Batlló and La Pedrera – the Waterfront with Columbus Monument and Old Port, and Montjuic Hill with its panoramic views over the city. You will end the tour in Poble Espanyol, with about 45 minutes free time to visit the village and have lunch.
